job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software
job.description: Job Summary:  This role will be a part of the resort sales team within the Guest Experience Digital Platform organization. The team supports the guest experience platform for multiple resort destinations which include the front-end website used by guests and travel agents as well as the core services which integrate with the commerce systems. As part of the team, the role will be responsible for the delivery of new capabilities, enhancement of existing capabilities and the modernization of the existing technical stack to take full advantage of cloud native architecture while continuing to support and sustain the existing front-end applications during the transition.  The Software Engineer applies practical knowledge of development and engineering to conceive, design, develop, test, and implement software fixes, enhancements, components, and/or new software systems and applications of moderate to high complexity. The Software Engineer helps drive development of components through his/her own’ and partner engineers’ work.  Responsibilities: Required Education  Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience  821486BR
